member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY
member.summary: Defines ready-state values for the Media Engine.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY_HAVE_METADATA
member.summary: Some metadata is available, including the duration and, for video files, the video dimensions. No media data is available.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY_HAVE_CURRENT_DATA
member.summary: There is media data for the current playback position, but not enough data for playback or seeking.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY_HAVE_FUTURE_DATA
member.summary: There is enough media data to enable some playback or seeking. The amount of data might be a little as the next video frame.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_READY_HAVE_ENOUGH_DATA
member.summary: There is enough data to play the resource, based on the current rate at which the resource is being fetched.
